configuration.bnd:
# We are using okhttp as sender, which does not have a dependency on grpc Import-Package: io.grpc*;resolution:=optional,*
# ServiceLoader provider # TODO: remove once bnd 7.1+ is released, will auto-detect the service loader provide-capability Provide-Capability: osgi.service;objectClass:List<String>="io.opentelemetry.exporter.internal.grpc.GrpcSenderProvider";effective:=active,osgi.service;objectClass:List<String>="io.opentelemetry.exporter.internal.http.HttpSenderProvider";effective:=active,osgi.serviceloader;osgi.serviceloader="io.opentelemetry.exporter.internal.grpc.GrpcSenderProvider";register:="io.opentelemetry.exporter.sender.okhttp.internal.OkHttpGrpcSenderProvider",osgi.serviceloader;osgi.serviceloader="io.opentelemetry.exporter.internal.http.HttpSenderProvider";register:="io.opentelemetry.exporter.sender.okhttp.internal.OkHttpHttpSenderProvider" Require-Capability: osgi.extender;filter:="(osgi.extender=osgi.serviceloader.registrar)"
